mapper.insert: insert into reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer,nickname) values (reply_seq.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, #{nickname})
mapper.update: update reply set reply = #{reply}, replyer = #{replyer},updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select count(rno) from reply where bno = #{bno}
